entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:07 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
